content: What is the best way to share scenarios across users ? I created a scenario and i am able to upate the fhir server but sharing the scenario itself , was not sure the approach for that - thanks

If Graph builder, then publish to the Library - and you'll get a link you can send to others. (You do have to copy from the dialog - I'll stick the link somewhere easier to find). For example, here's a lab example I'm working on: gb2.clinfhir.com#id1621630619512
What I'm doing here is to create the scenario, save to the server, then use the Query module to query it. Helps with defining the API...
i have been using Scenario Builder perhaps i should swich to Graph Builder 2 ?
That would be preferable! I'm not really developing scenario builder these days...

Look into the library - if you save to the library then you will get a url that you can share which will link to your project. (Note that there's an issue with sharing multiple view projects at the moment - if you stick to a single view you're fine...
Actually - ignore that comment - multi view works just fine in the library...
